title: Executive Order 7969-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of February 19, 1920, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 730
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497, the Executive order of February 19, 1920, creating Power Site Reserve No. 730, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands:
T. 4 S., R. 5 E., sec. 19, lot 1.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7969-Partial Revocation of Executive Order of February 19, 1920, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 730 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368788
